name: PD Howler 9.6 Digital Painter and Visual FX box
description: Available on Steam for the first time, PD Howler 9.6 is THE ultimate graphics and animation tool for all micro indie development studios.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: New enough to support GDI+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GPU access for some modules Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Please note that upon the first-time installation, you may see two instances of PD Howler launched. This is normal and only occurs during the first time use after installation: both the installer itself as well as Steam are launching an instance.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: Quad core or higher will help Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GPU access for some modules Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Please note that upon the first-time installation, you may see two instances of PD Howler launched. This is normal and only occurs during the first time use after installation: both the installer itself as well as Steam are launching an instance.

reviews.review_text: Really handy to work with curves and gradients!
